data.speaker: Player
data.content: It's an old newspaper... The pages are almost falling apart...

data.speaker: Player
data.content: ("December 5th 2024,  The spread of the Montreal virus shows no sign of stopping.")

data.speaker: Player
data.content: ("Border closures continue, with the UN security council convening for what may be the last time today.")

data.speaker: Player
data.content: ("Death toll having reached 3 billion people today...")

data.speaker: Player
data.content: A newspaper dated 3 years in the future about a cataclysmic world ending event?

data.speaker: Player
data.content: Someone's twisted idea of a practical joke, I guess...
